/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban life. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vista. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
